feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][BAREMETAL] - Reload network device
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 7, 01:00 - 02:00 UTC

Jan 12, 20:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/02/2023 01:00UTC
End time : 07/02/2023 02:00UTC
Service impact : Loss for vrack connection for all servers of the rack during reload.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade for multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX4][Network] - Rack 56D15
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 1, 05:30 - 06:30 UTC

Jan 11, 21:09 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Jan 11, 21:08 UTC
Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items.

Jan 11, 05:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 11, 03:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/02/2023 05:30 UTC 
End time : 01/02/2023 06:30 UTC 
Service impact : Public network will be unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance time.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are replacing a network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers/VPS] - Rescue mode
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 24, 09:00 - 10:45 UTC

Jan 11, 21:55 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 24/01/2023 09:00 UTC 
End time : 24/01/2023 10:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to remove options 'rescue64-pro' and 'rescue64-ovh' and replace them by 'rescue-customer' in 'Boot rescue mode' for dedicated and virtual private servers.
To use rescue mode, you can refer to the current link: https://docs.ovh.com/fr/dedicated/ovh-rescue/#en-pratique
